attributes.action: A complete ban on unsolicited marketing and scam phone calls
attributes.additional_details:
These companies buy masses of phone numbers so even if you block one of their numbers, other numbers they have still get through.
Petitions for this subjected have been submitted previously by others by 'archived' by the government. This seems as if the government do not care about this subject or the misery these companies cause to people.
Maybes even enforced phone service providers ( home and mobile ), to make them block such numbers.
attributes.background:
All UK mobile phone and home phone users are subject to unsolicited marketing phone calls for PPI, Accident claims, and so on and so on.
These companies completely banned from making unsolicited marketing and scam phone calls. A ban on UK and international companies.
